name: image-tagger
description: A simple and minimal image tagger application.
author: Ionică Bizău <bizauionica@gmail.com> (https://ionicabizau.net)

ol: Click the <kbd>Choose file</kbd> button and select an image.
Click the <kbd>Add Polygon</kbd>  button and draw a polygon on the image by clicking on the image.
Write a description for the polygon.
Click the <kbd>Finish</kbd> button to save the polygon.
Repeat the last two steps to add more polygons.
Click the <kbd>Download Data</kbd> button to download the HTML page.
